content:
Just a note: GCI ends on Monday (1 week from now), but the deadline to claim a new task is Friday 5pm UTC: https://developers.google.com/open-source/gci/timeline
So if you want to work on a task over the weekend (e.g. a github issue) make sure we create the task for you before Friday!
had so much fun!
No worries! I should have specified, GCI ends on Monday, but Zulip still has 518 open issues to resolve between now and November :).
Who should we contact with in case we want a task created?
Sending them a PM is okay in this case? I don't want to bother anyone
Hmm, you can try but expect a delay in the reply; it will be pretty late in their time zones.
you can ask any mentor to create a task, but they'll have to wait for publishing if they don't happen to have admin privileges - I don't think Steve has them, so please don't ping him :)
Correct, Alicja, thanks for the clarification. I don't have admin privileges.
